definition[0]: an official newspaper, especially one from the government giving important lists of people who have been employed by them etc
definition[1]: used in the names of some newspapers
definition[2]: a newspaper, often one listing official announcements such as legal notices or the names of people who have taken up a position in government. The word ‘Gazette’ is often used in newspaper titles
example[1]: Before any new statute can be enacted, it must be announced in the official gazette.
